alert.note: Alert for Flathead; Lake (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued January 27 at 8:14AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of Flathead Avalanche Center Hungry Horse MT. ...AVALANCHE WARNING ISSUED BY THE FLATHEAD AVALANCHE CENTER... 07:35 MST Fri Jan 27 2023 The Flathead Avalanche Center in Hungry Horse has issued a BACKCOUNTRY AVALANCHE WARNING for the following areas: NWS Missoula MT - MTC 029 (Flathead County)...MTC 047 (Lake County) * WHAT...The avalanche danger for the warning area will rise to HIGH due to intense precipitation rates in the Swan Range. * WHERE...On and below steep slopes above 5000 feet in the Swan Range. * WHEN...In effect from Fri 07:35 MST to Sat 07:00 MST. * IMPACTS...Intense precipitation rates will create widespread areas of unstable snow. * PRECAUTIONARY / PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...New snow will overload the snow surface and buried weak layers resulting in widespread areas of unstable snow and natural avalanches Consult http://www.flatheadavalanche.org/ or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center.
